pageTitle: Find out if you need to register
keywords: Bus operators,Businesses,Coach drivers,Drivers,Freight industry,Planning and construction,Public,Schools and young people,Suppliers,Buses,Coaches,Driving,TfL
description: Find out which vehicles need to register with us.

breadcrumbs.title: Find out if you need to register

title.title: Find out if you need to register

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Most vehicles don't need to register with us - even if they're from outside the United Kingdom - because we already know if they meet the emissions standard for the Low Emission Zone (LEZ) and the Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Register your vehicle with us if:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["It is \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected\"\u003elisted by us as NOT meeting LEZ/ULEZ emissions standards\u003c/a\u003e but you can provide evidence that it does","You are a \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected/exemptions-and-discounts\"\u003eshowman with a modified or specially constructed vehicle\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Register your vehicle with us if:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["It is \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected\"\u003elisted by us as NOT meeting LEZ/ULEZ emissions standards\u003c/a\u003e but you can provide evidence that it does","It qualifies for an exemption or discount. \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected/exemptions-and-discounts\"\u003eRead more about exemptions and discounts\u003c/a\u003e "]}
First, click the button below to check your vehicle. At the end of the process you will be able to register your vehicle with us if you still need to.

If you have already registered with us you must notify the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) immediately when your vehicle's number plate of your vehicle has changed if it has a Reduced Pollution or Low Emission Certificate.

For Heavy Goods Vehicles over 3.5 tonnes Gross Vehicle Weight you will need to submit a Notifiable Alteration Form, the appropriate fee along with the original Reduced Pollution or Low Emission Certificate. You can download the notifiable alteration form and guidance notes on GOV.UK .

For Light Goods Vehicles 3.5 tonnes Gross Vehicle Weight and under, you will need to send a copy of the V5C vehicle registration certificate (logbook) displaying the new Vehicle Registration Mark along with the original Reduced Pollution or Low Emission Certificate to:

Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency
PSV section
The Ellipse
Padley Road
Swansea
SA1 8AN
There is no fee for the issue of a new certificate.

For buses, coaches or minibuses, you will need to submit a copy of the V5C vehicle registration certificate (logbook) displaying the new number plate (Vehicle Registration Mar) along with the original Reduced Pollution or Low Emission Certificate and, if is applies, the original Certificate of Initial Fitness. All documents should be sent together to the address above.
There is no fee for the issue of new Reduced Pollution or Low Emission Certificates due to number plate change.
